metadata.title: Jorge Bastidas | decode9 - Full Stack Developer
metadata.description: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience. Specialized in scalable architectures, automation, and MVP development. TypeScript, React, Node.js, DevOps.

hero.name: Jorge
hero.description: Over <years>10 years</years> of experience developing technological solutions. Specialized in <arch>scalable architectures</arch>, <auto>automation</auto> and <mvp>MVPs</mvp>.

about.title: Building the
about.subtitle: Passionate developer creating technological solutions that positively impact businesses and their users.
about.intro: I'm <name>Jorge Bastidas</name>, known as <alias>decode9</alias> in the tech world. Since 2014, I've been dedicated to transforming ideas into functional digital products.
about.paragraph1: My focus is centered on <highlight>process automation</highlight> for businesses and everyday activities. I've worked in various companies, especially startups and businesses looking to optimize their operations through technology.
about.paragraph2: As an infrastructure leader and senior developer, I've guided teams in implementing scalable solutions, from MVPs to enterprise systems. My passion for video games has also led me to explore game development.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Development
fullstack.description: Complete development from frontend to backend, creating robust web and mobile applications.

architecture.title: Software Architecture
architecture.description: Design of scalable systems with microservices, clean architecture, and modern design patterns.

devops.title: DevOps & Cloud
devops.description: CI/CD implementation, containerization with Docker/Kubernetes, and deployment on AWS/DigitalOcean.

automation.title: Automation
automation.description: Creating tools and scripts to optimize business processes and workflows.

tech.title: My
tech.subtitle: Tools and technologies I master to create high-quality solutions.
tech.footer: Always learning and exploring new technologies. <highlight>Curiosity is my engine.</highlight>

projects.title: Featured
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects that demonstrate my experience and technical skills.

architecture.title: Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Examples of architectures and design patterns I implement in my projects.

microservices.title: Microservices Architecture
microservices.description: Design of distributed systems with independent services, asynchronous communication, and high availability.

clean.title: Clean Architecture
clean.description: Separation of responsibilities with independent layers: domain, application, infrastructure.

event.title: Event-Driven Architecture
event.description: Asynchronous communication through events, service decoupling, and scalability.

cqrs.title: CQRS Pattern
cqrs.description: Separation of read and write operations to optimize performance and scalability.

problems.title: Common
problems.subtitle: Real examples of problems I've solved and their optimized solutions.

contact.title: Let's Work
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? I'd love to hear your ideas and help make them a reality.
contact.description: I'm available for freelance projects, technical consulting, or just to chat about technology. Don't hesitate to contact me.
contact.findMe: You can also find me on
contact.availableDescription: Currently accepting new projects. Average response time is 24-48 hours.

footer.description: Full Stack Developer with over 10 years of experience creating innovative technological solutions. Specialized in scalable architectures and process automation.
